FuncDef:
The device power manage cycle command sets the interval for updating power consumption data.
The undo device power manage cycle command restores the default interval for updating power consumption data. The device power manage cycle command sets the interval for updating power consumption data. The undo device power manage cycle command restores the default interval for updating power consumption data. By default, the interval for updating power consumption data is 1 hour.

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the interval for updating power consumption data.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 6.
1: 15 minutes2: 30 minutes3: one hour4: one day5: one week6: one month

ExtraInfo: The average power consumption of a device is the average power consumption within a period of time. You can run the device power manage cycle command to set the interval for calculating the average power consumption. To obtain real-time power consumption, set a short interval.
